CustomField.description: When the Account's Send Invoice Emails Setting defines the email source as 'Global Email' the email address defined in this field will be used as the from / reply to email when emailing Invoices. The email entered must be an Organization-Wide Address.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the Account's Send Invoice Emails Setting defines the email source as 'Global Email' the email address defined in this field will be used as the from / reply to email when emailing Invoices. The email entered must be an Organization-Wide Address.
CustomField.label: Send Invoice Emails From Email
